sql.search: SELECT -- 必须全部加载主表字段 main.* ,dept.dept_name ,dept.dept_full_name ,post.position_name position_name ,SYS004.sub_name sex_name ,insert_user.user_name insert_user_name ,update_user.user_name update_user_name ,dept_manage.dept_uids dept_manage_uids ,city_manage.city_uids city_manage_uids ,sign_company_manage.company_uids sign_company_manage_uids ,temp_dept.user_company_uid ,temp_dept.user_company_name ,temp_dept.user_company_full_name ,temp_dept.user_area_uid ,temp_dept.user_area_name ,temp_dept.user_area_full_name ,user_roles.user_role_names FROM sys_user main LEFT JOIN sys_dept dept ON dept.uid = main.dept_uid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT company_dept.uid user_company_uid, company_dept.dept_name user_company_name, company_dept.dept_full_name user_company_full_name, area_dept.uid user_area_uid, area_dept.dept_name user_area_name, area_dept.dept_full_name user_area_full_name FROM sys_dept company_dept LEFT JOIN sys_dept area_dept ON company_dept.parent_dept_uid = area_dept.uid WHERE company_dept.dept_class = 2 AND company_dept.record_status = 1 AND area_dept.dept_class = 1 AND area_dept.record_status = 1 ) temp_dept ON temp_dept.user_company_uid = dept.company_dept_uid LEFT JOIN sys_position post ON post.uid = main.position_uid AND post.record_status = 1 LEFT JOIN sys_dictionary SYS004 ON SYS004.record_status = 1 AND SYS004.main_cd = 'SYS004' AND SYS004.sub_cd = main.sex_cd LEFT JOIN sys_user insert_user ON insert_user.uid = main.insert_user LEFT JOIN sys_user update_user ON update_user.uid = main.update_user LEFT JOIN (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(dept_uid) dept_uids, user_uid FROM sys_dept_manage WHERE record_status = 1 GROUP BY user_uid) dept_manage ON dept_manage.user_uid = main.uid LEFT JOIN (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(city_uid) city_uids, user_uid FROM sys_city_manage WHERE record_status = 1 GROUP BY user_uid) city_manage ON city_manage.user_uid = main.uid LEFT JOIN (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(sign_company_uid) company_uids, user_uid FROM sys_sign_company_manage WHERE record_status = 1 GROUP BY user_uid) sign_company_manage ON sign_company_manage.user_uid = main.uid LEFT JOIN (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT b.role_name) user_role_names, a.user_uid FROM sys_user_role a, sys_role b WHERE a.record_status = 1 AND b.record_status = 1 AND b.uid = a.role_uid GROUP BY a.user_uid) user_roles ON user_roles.user_uid = main.uid WHERE (main.record_status = 1 OR main.record_status = 8) %s
sql.getCurrentUserPermissions: SELECT CONCAT(permission.domain, ':', permission.targets, ':', permission.actions) part FROM sys_role_permission role_permission, sys_user_role user_role, sys_permission permission WHERE user_role.role_uid = role_permission.role_uid AND role_permission.permission_uid = permission.uid AND permission.record_status = 1
sql.updateLoginCountAndTime: UPDATE sys_user SET login_count = IFNULL(login_count, 0) + 1 ,last_login_time = NOW() WHERE uid = :userUid
